LanguageData.CheatMenu.Shared.Message.SelectCellForCh: Select a map cell for {0}. Right-click to stop targeting.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Shared.Message.NoThings: No things found on that cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.SpawnThing.Label: Spawn Thing
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.SpawnThing.Description: Select a ThingDef, choose stack size (if stackable), then place it on the map.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.SpawnPawn.Label: Spawn Pawn
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.SpawnPawn.Description: Select a PawnKindDef, then place the generated pawn on the map.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnThing.SelectWindow.Title: Select Thing To Spawn
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnThing.SelectWindow.Search: Search by ThingDef label or defName.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnThing.StackWindow.Title: Select Stack Count
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnPawn.SelectWindow.Title: Select Pawn To Spawn
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnPawn.SelectWindow.SearchT: Search by pawn label, defName, or category.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.Destroy.Label: Destroy
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.Destroy.Description: Destroy all things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.Kill.Label: Kill
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.Kill.Description: Kill all things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.LightningStrike.Label: Lightning Strike
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.LightningStrike.Descri: Call a lightning strike on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.LightningStrikeDelayed: Select a delay, then schedule a lightning strike on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.ChangeWeather.Label: Change Weather...
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.ChangeWeather.Descript: Select a weather type, then transition the current map to it.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.GrowPlantToMaturity.De: Advance the plant on the selected map cell to full growth.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.GrowPlantOneDay.Label: Grow Plant 1 Day
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.GrowPlantOneDay.Descri: Advance the plant on the selected map cell by up to one in-game day of growth.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.GrowPlant.Message.NoPl: No growable plant was found on that cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.Damage10.Label: 10 Damage
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.Damage10.Description: Deal 10 crush damage to all things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.DamageX.Label: Deal X Damage
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.DamageX.Description: Select a damage amount, then deal that crush damage to all things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.DamageX.Window.Title: Select Damage Amount
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.FinishAllResearch.Desc: Complete every research project and unhide all research entries.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.ToggleGodMode.Label: Toggle God Mode
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.ToggleGodMode.Descript: Toggle RimWorld god mode on or off.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.ToggleLogWindow.Label: Toggle Log Window
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.ToggleLogWindow.Descri: Open or close the debug log window.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.ForceEnemyFlee.Label: Force Enemy Flee
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.ForceEnemyFlee.Descrip: Force hostile auto-flee enemy lords on the current map to begin panic fleeing.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.ForceEnemyFlee.Message: No eligible enemy lords were found.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.SetQuality.Label: Set Quality
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.SetQuality.Description: Select a quality, then apply it to all quality-bearing things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.AddGas.Label: Add Gas
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.AddGas.Description: Select a gas type, then add gas to the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.SetFaction.Label: Set Faction
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.SetFaction.Description: Select a faction, then apply it to all faction-capable things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.SetFaction.Message.NoF: No faction-capable things were found on that cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.SetFactionRelations.De: Choose a faction and relation kind to adjust goodwill with the player faction.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.ChangeThingStyle.Label: Change Thing Style
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.ChangeThingStyle.Descr: Pick a styleable thing on a selected map cell, then choose a style to apply.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.ChangeThingStyle.Messa: No styleable thing was found on that cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.FogRect.Label: Fog (Rect)
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.FogRect.Description: Drag a rectangle to refog cells on the map.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.UnfogRect.Label: Unfog (Rect)
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.UnfogRect.Description: Drag a rectangle to clear fog from cells on the map.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.EditRoofRect.Label: Edit Roof (Rect)
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.EditRoofRect.Descripti: Select a roof type (or clear), then drag a rectangle on the map to apply it.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.EditRoofRect.Window.Se: Search by roof label or defName.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.AwardHonor.Label: Award X Honor
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.AwardHonor.Description: Select honor amount and faction, then target a pawn to award honor.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.AwardHonor.FactionWind: Choose the faction that grants the honor.
No factions with royal titles are currently available.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.AwardHonor.Message.Sel: Select a pawn for {0}. Right-click to stop targeting.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.General.AwardHonor.Message.NoF: No factions with royal titles are currently available.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.QuestGenerateQuest.Label: Generate Quest
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.QuestGenerateQuest.Descr: Open a quest-script menu and generate a selected quest with optional points/population inputs.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Quests.Window.Title: Select Quest
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Quests.PointsWindow.Title: Select Quest Points
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Quests.PopulationWindow.Title: Select Colony Population
